name: University of Mines and Technology - Sustainable Research and Innovation Department
description: The University of Mines and Technology (UMaT) is Ghana's premier mining and technology university, renowned for excellence in education, research, and innovation. The Sustainable Research and Innovation Department (SRID) focuses on cutting-edge research in sustainability science, infrastructure development, and emerging technologies.
